Omega.expr: max( min( slotwidth+(x-centerx), min( slotwidth-(x-centerx), slotlength-(y-centery+radius) ) ), sqrt(pow(x-centerx,2)+pow(y-centery,2)) - radius ) :x:y:centerx:centery:radius:slotwidth:slotlength
